p: Finally, we suggest focusing management actions on the terrestrial morphotype in order to control the expansion of L. grandiflora. Recent studies that assessed the effects of climate changes on the potential distribution of L. grandiflora predicts future increase in the size of its bioclimatic range, especially into Ireland, United Kingdom, Germany, the Netherlands, and Denmark (Gillard, Thiébaut, Deleu, & Leroy, 2017). In this context, the dispersal in terrestrial habitat of L. grandiflora could also concern in the future these Europeans countries.
